concept.title: Introduction
concept.shortdesc: The HTML5 and javascript plugin is an attempt to add better HTML5 support to the html5 plugin.

conbody.p: Frameset and frames support have been removed from the HTML5 specifications, so we use the way to replace the current mechanism. Alternative way would have been to use iFrame or to include the navigation inside each pages.

The main issue with the iFrame mechanism is that the page in the iFrame does not belongs to the page, may be not applied consisent consistently and the document could not be easely manipulated by javascript since it is not accessible in the .
